observation: Prosoft Ltd | Mastercam Reseller NZ  Skip to content Home Solutions Suppliers Support Testimonials About Us Contact Menu Linkedin Facebook Instagram Mastercam creates software and services that solve the world’s manufacturing challenges Mastercam – Strength and Stability READ MORE Mastercam University Machining technology is always progressing. Find high-quality training opportunities to stay current and competitive FIND OUT MORE CNC Communication Cimco CIMCO has advanced CNC-Editors, reliable CNC communication and data management for real-time monitoring. Postability Inc Postability Inc. is a bespoke software development firm focused on the development of NC post processors for Mastercam CAD/CAM Systems, which are used in the programming of computer-controlled machine tools. Mastercam Support Dynamic Motion™ Part quality, extended tool life, repeatability – even the longevity of your machines – are directly related to this motion, and our customer support network is second-to-none COMMUNITY KNOWLEDGE BASE Mastercam Blog Keep tabs on Mastercam news and events, product information, tips and tricks, success stories from our global community, and much more. Mastercam Home Learning Edition Mastercam Home Learning Edition (HLE) is a free CAD/CAM software for demo and Educational purposes. It is a trial version of Mastercam that can be used to learn at home and experience everything the industrial version of Mastercam can do (does not post G-code). GET STARTED Your Name (required) Subject Your Message Mobile: Email: Copyright © 2020 Prosoft Ltd, All Rights Reserved

thought: The extracted text doesn't show any immediate signs of the typical scam characteristics, such as unusually low prices or unrealistic promises of money. However, the mention of free educational software could potentially be a lure used by scam websites. I should check the legitimacy of the company and product offerings next.
